_sText:
- NOVELTIES : 
- New design for arms factory
- More ammunitions in weapons
- More weapons in the arms factory
- An awp is recoverable only by counter-terrorists above kitchen
- The shooting range was changed with distributors of weapons and a new trap !
- the conduit of the cage bring directly in the kitchen
- the glazed passage was deleted and the button to open the cage was moved more low
- the conduit of the polling booth was deleted, but the hidden button permit to open the door of the polling booth
- the conduit between the kitchen and the disco was deleted
- there is a new footbridge in the disco for counter-terrorists 
- there is a gun in the disco
- the ball of foot was changed and it rises higher
- there is a new footbridge in the soccer field for counter-terrorists
- the players do not cross any more furniture
- some weapons was deleted or changed in various conduits  
- the conduit between jails and arms factory was changed : only an access since the top of cells  
- some area was changed to counter-terrorists' area
- a break floor was created with two access for counter-terrorists and a footbridge around
- a weapon is hidden in the break floor
- buttons to open jails was changed
- personals textures was created
- The opening of polling booth and of the central cage was changed
- An new access for counter-terrorists in the disco was created
- (New order) : A three stairs was created without weapons and conduits
- (New order) : Several boxes was created between the central cage and the swimming pool without weapons and conduits. 

Have a good fun !

Video of presentation : 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CkW8xUFpuf0&feature=youtu.be
